msgProfileRequired: Update your profile to unlock chat.
categoryProtection: You can only contact members within your field of study.
name: Name
course_update_success_desc: Your course information has been successfully saved.
assignments_description: Review and grade student submissions for your courses.
firestoreIndexError: An error occurred while loading data. A Firestore index might be missing. Please check the console for more details.
create_course_for_assignments: Create a course to add assignments to it.
deleteCourseConfirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the course "{{courseTitle}}"? This action is irreversible.
courseDeletedMessage: The course has been successfully deleted.
noCoursesFoundMessage: Click the button to start creating your first course.
clickToUpload: Click to upload or drag & drop
alreadySubmitted: You have already submitted your work for this assignment.
noAssignmentsTodo: No assignments to do. Good job!
noAssignmentsGraded: No assignments have been graded yet.
navMyAssignments_desc: Track and submit your assignments here.
course_complete_desc: You have successfully completed the course:
tour_step1_desc: Use the search to discover new skills and find the perfect course for you.
tour_step2_desc: Ask questions, get explanations, and receive personalized help anytime.
tour_step3_desc: All your earned certificates are stored here, ready to be shared.
welcome_desc: Ready to discover your new learning space? Let's take a quick tour.
profile_incomplete_desc_chat: To access messaging and connect with other members, please complete your profile by adding a username and your field of interest.
select_conversation: Select a conversation to start chatting.
select_student_to_chat: Select a student from your field to start a chat.
chat_permission_denied: You can only chat with members in your field of study. Complete your profile to get started.
revenue_description: Track your earnings and manage your payouts.
revenue_modal_desc: The minimum for a withdrawal is {{threshold}}. Your available balance is {{balance}}.
revenue_no_payouts: No payout requests have been made.
footer_subtitle: Learn future-proof skills with courses designed by local experts. Pay easily with Mobile Money.
payoutsManagementDescription: Review and manage instructor payout requests.
noPayoutsForStatus: There are no {{status}} payout requests at this time.
payoutMarkedAs: The payout has been marked as {{status}}.
payoutUpdateError: Could not update the payout status.
marketingDescription: Create promotional codes and manage marketing announcements for the platform.
mktExamples: Use natural language. For example: "Create a 20% discount for Easter" or "Write an announcement for a new course".
aiRequestProcessed: Your request has been processed by the AI.
aiRequestError: There was an error processing your request with the AI.
promoLoadError: Error: Could not load promo codes.
promoUpdateError: Failed to update the promo code.
adminNotConnected: Admin user is not connected. Please log in again.
userDeletedMessage: The user {{name}} has been permanently deleted.
deleteErrorMessage: An unknown error occurred while deleting the user.
congrats_sent_desc: Your encouragement message has been sent to {{name}}.
congrats_sent_error: Could not send the encouragement message.
editRoleDescription: Changing a user's role can significantly alter their permissions.
deleteUserConfirmationTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
deleteUserConfirmationMessage: This will permanently delete the user {{name}} and all their associated data. This action cannot be undone.
manageUsersDescription: View, manage, and edit user profiles and roles on the platform.
allRegisteredUsers: All registered users on the platform.
